failureThreshold.description: Number of consecutive failures to trigger disabling

failureRateThreshold.description: Failure rate percentage to trigger disabling (0-100)

timeWindowDays.description: Time window in days for analysis

excludeRepositories.description: List of repository names to exclude from analysis

safelistWorkflows.description: List of workflow file names that should never be disabled

dryRun.description: Whether to run in dry-run mode by default

githubToken.description: GitHub Personal Access Token (can also be set via GITHUB_TOKEN env var)
